Title: Straight-Razor Shaving: A Semi-Bloody Tutorial
Book Description: 'Want the closest shave you can get without self-Sweeney Todding yourself?  Straight-razor shaves are intimidating - so let us show you how it all works in a live demonstration- removing our stubble for your edification!'

Title: Elements of Costuming for Dr. Who
Presenters: Justin Coluzzi, Kevin McLeod, Alex Drummer
Book Description: 'Trace the history of the Doctor through costuming elements of each one's style- and learn how to mix and match fashions to create your own Dr. Who look.'
